name: America Oudan Ultra Quiz
overview: America Oudan Ultra Quiz is a game based on a japanese TV quiz show. The game was released on Playstation and Saturn in 1995. The game is a sequel of a NES game released in 1992 that was also based on the TV show. The gameplay is about selecting the right answer to advance in the game, there are different kind of questions and the game features up to 4 human players (that can select from 16 different characters) to play at the same time using the multitap.
